revised_title: The Physical Law of Attraction in Blood-Corpuscles Aggregation
tldr: The author investigates the behavior of blood-corpuscles and their aggregation, concluding that it is due to a physical law of molecular attraction. The author demonstrates this through various experiments, including the formation of rouleaux and the behavior of bubbles and vesicles in liquid. This research provides insight into the underlying causes of various phenomena related to blood-corpuscles and their role in the body.
